channel.title: redis on tureo
channel.description: Recent content in redis on tureo

item.title: Redis不能远程访问
item.description: 问题 远程访问redis执行命令报错如下: 1 2 3 100.128.100.100:6379> flushall (error) DENIED Redis is running in protected mode because protected mode is enabled, no bind address was specified, no authentication password is requested to clients. In this mode connections are only accepted from the loopback interface. If you want to connect from external computers to
